attributes.action: make all genuine single outlet small businesses exempt from business rates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is getting harder and harder for small businesses to survive, and the greatest threat to their existance is business rates for which they get very little in return (despite being forced to pay huge sums of money businesses are not even entitled to waste collection!)making genuine single outlet businesses exempt from business rates would save hundreds of small businesses which are on the brink, as well as saving the jobs of the many people they employ.
